title: To Present a Proposal for Developing the Business Plan for the Ontario Digital Library

outline.text: A Critical Component for Implementing Ontario’s Road Map to Prosperity Strategy
The Business Plan to be Developed
Appendix A: ODL Envisioned Phases & Funding
Funding Source 2007 2017 Government $35M (70%) $33.75M (45%) Libraries $10M (20%) $22.5M (30%) Endowment $4.5M (9%) $15M (20%) Gifts/In-Kind $0.5M (1%) $3.75M (5%) TOTAL ANNUAL $50M $75M
Appendix B: ODL Steering Committee Terms of Reference

• Strategic thinkers; • Committed to the concept of multi-sector partnerships; • Knowledgeable about digital libraries and resources; • Knowledgeable about government structures; • Respected by their communities; influential; • Able to take a consultative approach; • Able to devote time to Steering Committee business: approximately one day per month for meetings plus 2-3 working days per month on related activities .
Appendix C: ODL’s Envisioned Electronic Resources
